interface.name: ThreadDeathRequest
interface.javadoc:
Request for notification when a thread terminates in the target VM. When an enabled ThreadDeathRequest is satisfied, an{@link com.sun.jdi.event.EventSet event set} containing a{@link com.sun.jdi.event.ThreadDeathEvent ThreadDeathEvent}will be placed on the{@link com.sun.jdi.event.EventQueue EventQueue}. The collection of existing ThreadDeathRequests is managed by the {@link EventRequestManager}
